main event: A mysterious light was observed in the sky over Los Angeles, California on July 6, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for several minutes., The object was initially thought to be a missile., Witnesses described the object as a round, red light that became a ball of fire and then disappeared., Workers at the airport control tower estimated the light's altitude and noted its speed as blinding., Over 40 calls were made to the police regarding the sighting.
witness description: residents in the southwestern area and airport workers
